document_data.mainbody:
igh Hold was one of the many small towns and villages found in the Rauvin Vale,  within the Silver Marches. It was named for the foreland it was set upon, that looked over the Evermoors from the opposite side of the River Rauvin.
The leader of the community was known as the Holdmaster. The town fell under the authority and governance of Silverymoon.
